notes:
OPTIONAL BETA UPDATE (EXPERIMENTAL)
beta.5
- added pause/reset button to top bar when meter window is large enough
- fix bug where damage % will show when solo
- improve local player guessing
beta.1
- completely ported and rewritten the packet sniffer and processor for rust
- added self-buff summaries (e.g. total damage % during igniter, or total adrenaline uptime)
full patch notes on github
